title: Chef

terms_text: This application is subject to the terms and conditions governed by the laws of the Palestinian Ministry of Health, and according to these laws, and once you accept these laws, you are responsible for any advertisement you make, and you are responsible for any person you employ, and from this standpoint we confirm that the owners of the application are free from legal accountability
about_text: The Chef app is a specialized application for hiring cooks in restaurants and hotels, where the chef can register in the application and search for a job, and restaurants and hotels can register in the application to announce their need for jobs
